thread.title: Electro Rent Corporation Declares Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
thread.title_full: Electro Rent Corporation Declares Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend

author: admin
title: Electro Rent Corporation Declares Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Electro Rent Corporation 
VAN NUYS, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Electro Rent Corporation (Nasdaq: ELRC) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.125 per common share. The dividend will be paid on October 9, 2015 to shareholders of record as of September 18, 2015. 
About Electro Rent 
Electro Rent Corporation ( www.ElectroRent.com ) is one of the largest global organizations devoted to the rental, leasing and sales of general purpose electronic test equipment, personal computers and servers.
